mapper.select: /* FreePassInfoMapper.xml, searchFreePassDrmInfo,정액제 상품 DRM 정보 조회 , 김형식/SK플래닛, 2014-03-03 */ SELECT IV.* FROM ( SELECT PD.PROD_ID , PM.PART_PROD_ID AS episodeProdId , PD.DRM_YN , PD.USE_PERIOD_UNIT_CD , PD.USE_PERIOD , CM.CMPX_PROD_CLSF_CD , PD.TOP_MENU_ID , TP.PROD_STATUS_CD FROM TB_DP_PROD PD , TB_DP_CMPX_PROD CM , TB_DP_PROD_DESC DC , TB_DP_TENANT_PROD TP , TB_DP_TENANT_PROD_PRICE PR ,(SELECT A.PROD_ID , B.PART_PROD_ID FROM TB_DP_FIXRATE_PROD_MAPG A ,TB_DP_PROD_RSHP B WHERE A.PART_PROD_ID = B.PROD_ID AND B.PROD_RSHP_CD ='DP010802' AND B.PART_PROD_ID=#{episodeProdId} )PM WHERE PD.PROD_ID = #{prodId} AND PD.PROD_ID = CM.PROD_ID AND PD.PROD_ID = DC.PROD_ID AND PD.PROD_ID = TP.PROD_ID AND PD.PROD_ID = PR.PROD_ID AND PD.PROD_ID = PM.PROD_ID AND DC.LANG_CD = #{langCd} AND TP.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND TP.TENANT_ID = PR.TENANT_ID AND SYSDATE BETWEEN PR.APPLY_START_DT AND PR.APPLY_END_DT ) IV
